name: Novaq S.A
tagline: Development and technology on internet platforms
description:
If you are going to invest in the Internet, make sure your investment is backed up. With NÓVAQ you have the guarantee of a company that looks for long-term allies, with a minimum rotation of clients, and satisfied companies in all industries.
We have more than 16 years in the market, acknowledgments from CNN, Discovery Channel, Newsweek Magazine, hundreds of clients,  and are winners of national and international awards.
